title.choose: The End of Human Journey on Earth

about.draw: What do the brutal forces of anthropocene hold for the future of Earth? The cards are divided into environmental, geopolitical and social destructive forces. Draw 3 cards and see what might unleash the end of humanity.
about.choose:
Which of the following brutal forces of anthropocene do you believe might unleash the end of humanity?
Choose only ONE and see what other people bet.
